sn1.13:4.2: Standing to one side, that deity recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn1.13:5.1: “There’s no love like that for a child,
sn1.13:5.3: no light like that of the sun,
sn1.13:5.4: and of waters the ocean is paramount.”
sn1.13:6.1: “There’s no love like that for a child,
sn1.13:6.3: no light like that of wisdom,
sn1.13:6.4: and of waters the rain is paramount.”
